data.message: That was a fucking amazing night, 360 killed it with the opening , homegrown David Dallas owned it,  Action Bronson pumped the crowd up, J-Cole pumped it more up , Then Eminem honestly blew the Croud away, fucking amazing , Thanks Eminem ,

replies.message: awesome im going to the melbourne concert wednesday night woo hoo cant wait

Kendrick pulled out. Then Odd Future were meant to replace him, but NZ Immigration didn't allow them in to the country. I'm Kiwi, and I sometimes hate NZ. But Eminem killed it! Best show you may ever see!
Which songs did em perform cos we need to know what he's going to be performing here in SA. Was it just stuff from MMLP2 his latest album?
hay bro.... will you please send me few photos of Eminem that you taken from the show.... please
I love wat u just sed Ben!!!! yup also going 2 his concert in Joburg!!! 13 more days til the rap god is here!!!
brisbane on thursday, i cant wait
he performed allsorts of songs, rapgod, bezurk, soldiers,lighters, not afraid, love the waqy you lie,
honestly it was the best night ever, , hands down,  his title as Rap god is a understatement
im the poorest girl in the crowd, did u enjoy?
